title: Afk, Rage Quitting in Ranked Games
body: I think I speak for the vast majority of players when I say we have had enough. I just lost my series due to quitters. there are things riot can do to stop this behavior from destroying our experience of the game. You can ban IP addresses, so those people with multiple accts can't just relog and continue to do this. You can ban accts from playing ranked games. This has got to stop, I am growing tired of climbing the ranks just to lose my series and get screwed out of my promotion. There's no point in giving us a free win if your just gonna Que us up with known quitters. Enough is Enough Riot!!!!!!!!!

replies.body:
Normally I wouldn't post about this but after having picked ranked back up I'm beyond pissed at the amount of rage quitting and afking in ranked. For my SR placement matches  I lost 4 games due to rage quitters with 2 having double rage quitters. One had a afker and the rest were actually pretty good and yes I made some mistakes in all of them some were quite bad and hilarious. I've since lost several SR games due to ragers and rage quitters as well as bad team play including myself as well as the other team just flat outplaying us.


For TT ranked I've lost several games due to people either rage quitting or purposely throwing the game as well as a game recently where 1 person  quit then came back after almost 10 mins and said their parents wanted them to do homework and they got caught playing instead. They admitted they didn't think they'd get caught so they left again. Then to avoid Leaverbuster they kept joining and leaving and you have to wonder why isn't there a 1 week ban for crap like that, especially in ranked.
I don't think they are ever gonna do anything more then they already are.
Said this on a level 10 account because of possible backlash? lol
You never know. there are things that can be done that they seemingly wont do.
Maybe so.
That would be messed up for them to take action against a player who is fed up. But I agree, there are things that can be done. Riot just wont do it.

It's not that they just won't it's because of reasons, iffy reasons... legit in some cases that cant be controlled.


I agree it's unfortunate though.

Some people end up with emergency situations irl and instantly leave because of it, internet provider could have issues.... there's also the thing that they may be a first time offender so they won't receive max/high level punishment.


But if it's obvious they ragequit/afk because of bad play or so then they do deserve punishment, otherwise riot cant tell and would have to hesitate and make a random guess
